verbose_text: Additionally, HIF1alpha inhibition by acriflavine treatment in MSO / IL-10 macrophages rescued the M2- to M1 like phenotype switching, as demonstrated by the decreased expression of markers typically expressed in classically activated macrophages, such as TNF-alpha, CXCL10, and inducible nitric oxide synthase (NOS2) (XREF_FIG C), and the concomitant increase of markers expressed in IL-10 macrophages, such as CCL17, MRS1, CCL18, and MRC1 (XREF_FIG C).
evidence: HIF1alpha inhibition by acriflavine treatment in MSO/IL-10 macrophages rescued the M2- to M1
